医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
单细胞转录组分析揭示肾移植排斥的特定细胞特征想象一下，有一天，尿液测试可以准确地告知医生肾移植患者出现器官排斥的原因，并建议专门解决该问题的最佳药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Single-cell-transcriptomic-analysis-reveals-special-cellular-signatures-for-kidney-transplant-rejection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Single-cell-transcriptomic-analysis-reveals-special-cellular-signatures-for-kidney-transplant-rejection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c779978a-cb53-4331-b053-65c1e332196d Wed, 28 Jun 2023 10:06:51 -0400 Single-cell transcriptomic analysis reveals specific cellular signatures for kidney transplant rejection
美国解剖学协会谴责人体捐赠者的商业化针对哈佛医学院遗体捐献项目非法买卖被盗身体部位的指控，美国解剖学协会（AAA）一致强烈谴责人体捐献者的商业化以及任何违反捐献者道德和道德的行为。相信。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/American-Association-for-Anatomy-condemns-commercialization-of- human-body-donors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/American-Association-for-Anatomy-condemns-commercialization-of- human-body-donors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc12f2d1-0d21-415b-975a-1da4ffb2b740 Wed, 28 Jun 2023 10:01:11 -0400 American Association for Anatomy condemns commercialization of human body donors
新纳米颗粒可以改善基于 mRNA 的疫苗的递送约翰·霍普金斯大学医学科学家表示，他们已经开发出一种纳米粒子——；一个极其微小的可生物降解容器-；它有可能改善基于信使核糖核酸 (mRNA) 的疫苗的交付，用于治疗 COVID-19 等传染病，以及治疗癌症等非传染病的疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/New-nanoarticle-could-improve-the-delivery-of-mRNA-based-vaccines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/New-nanoarticle-could-improve-the-delivery-of-mRNA-based-vaccines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e2ac7a7-5fd9-4bf8-9bff-49d37774870f Wed, 28 Jun 2023 09:58:23 -0400 New nanoparticle could improve the delivery of mRNA-based vaccines
多面装置提供快速出血管理寺崎生物医学创新研究所 (TIBI) 的科学家们设计了一种多面设备，可有效治疗深层、不可压缩和不规则形状的伤口。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Multi-faceted-device-provides-rapid-hemorrhage-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Multi-faceted-device-provides-rapid-hemorrhage-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a5beead-7c99-461f-81bb-9d3b3eb6808c Wed, 28 Jun 2023 09:39:29 -0400 Multi-faceted device provides rapid hemorrhage management
保护过去，保护未来：定向 DNA 富集检测博物馆标本中的人畜共患病原体研究描述了一种从博物馆存档的动物组织中寻找人畜共患病原体的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Preserving-the-past-protecting-the-future-targeted-DNA-enrichment-detects-zoonotic-pathogens-in-museum-specimens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Preserving-the-past-protecting-the-future-targeted-DNA-enrichment-detects-zoonotic-pathogens-in-museum-specimens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=371a8125-0456-4bd3-ace4-e88ae5511256 Wed, 28 Jun 2023 08:56:00 -0400 Preserving the past, protecting the future: targeted DNA enrichment detects zoonotic pathogens in museum specimens
研究人员利用脂质体开发光控药物输送系统人工脂质双层囊泡脂质体，也称为蛋白脂质体，是能够掺入各种分子（例如化学品和药物）的专门系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Researchers-develop-light-control-drug-delivery-system-using-liposomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Researchers-develop-light-control-drug-delivery-system-using-liposomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ae90449-4552-4330-8611-9bbfeb0868d0 Wed, 28 Jun 2023 07:33:28 -0400 Researchers develop light-controlled drug delivery system using liposomes
研究发现 SARS-CoV-2 mRNA 疫苗接种可诱导鼻粘膜产生免疫反应众所周知，呼吸道病毒能够通过眼睛、鼻子或嘴巴进入人体。我们的身体也知道这一点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/SARS-CoV-2-mRNA-vaccination-induces-an-immune-response-in-the-nasal-mucosa-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/SARS-CoV-2-mRNA-vaccination-induces-an-immune-response-in-the-nasal-mucosa-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d8a2136-7d08-4bc5-83f1-b07246a1a872 Wed, 28 Jun 2023 07:18:10 -0400 SARS-CoV-2 mRNA vaccination induces an immune response in the nasal mucosa, study finds
研究分析了 COVID-19 期间英国金钱与心理健康之间的关系阿斯顿大学个人财务健康中心发布了一份报告，概述了由货币和养老金服务局（MaPS）资助的一项关于英国金钱与心理健康之间关系的快速证据审查的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Study-analyzes-the-relationship- Between-money-and-mental-health-in-the-UK-during-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230628/Study-analyzes-the-relationship- Between-money-and-mental-health-in-the-UK-during-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=09979601-309f-4782-a320-dbb9b51361f4 Wed, 28 Jun 2023 07:06:42 -0400 Study analyzes the relationship between money and mental health in the UK during COVID-19
